channel.title: My server is offline?
channel.description: Hello guys, im having a bit of a problem. I had my server up and running good untill i restarted my netgear router. After I did that, i ran the server and when i checked the status of it, it was offline. IDK what the problem is, i tried to re powerforward but notting worked.

item.title: My server is offline?
item.dc:creator: @Mr.czar Mr.czar
item.description:
@Mr.czar wrote:

re-portforward your local ip address renewed itâ€™s self upon restart.

item.title: My server is offline?
item.dc:creator: @jibbahz jibbahz
item.description:
@jibbahz wrote:

Hello guys, im having a bit of a problem. I had my server up and running good untill i restarted my netgear router.
After I did that, i ran the server and when i checked the status of it, it was offline.
IDK what the problem is, i tried to re powerforward but notting worked.

Read full topic
